授業目的: The purpose of this course is to build on the skills developed in Sci Tech English B and develop students' reading, vocabulary learning and critical thinking skills further. Students do not need to have completed Sci Tech English A
到達目標: Students will be able to think critically to a deeper level when reading a variety of texts, identify key vocabulary and record it in a systematic way and develop discussion skills further. There will be a focus on science and technology.
